name: Red-Eyes Slash Dragon
desc:
"Red-Eyes B. Dragon" + 1 Warrior monster
When a "Red-Eyes" monster declares an attack: You can target 1 Warrior monster in your GY; equip it to this card as an Equip Spell Card with this effect.
‚óè The equipped monster gains 200 ATK.
When a card or effect is activated that targets a card(s) you control (Quick Effect): You can send 1 Equip Card you control to the GY; negate the activation, and if you do, destroy that card. If this card is destroyed by battle or card effect: You can Special Summon as many monsters that were equipped to this card as possible from your GY.
